description: Typically, the appearance of an alcoholic, Japanese, crossdressing wrestler with cerebral palsy named L'Amant ("The Lover") in a film at Fantastic Fest would be considered fairly normal. Except when it's not a character in [insert any one of our favorite Japanese directors here]'s new movie, but rather one of the subjects in a documentary about an underground wrestling league in Japan where disabled wrestlers fight able-bodied opponents.
synopsis: A look inside one of the world's oddest wrestling leagues, where disabled fighters take on able-bodied opponents in brutal and bloody fights for their own dignity and self-respect. From where else but Japan?
title: Doglegs
